channel.title: London Evening Standard | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/eveningstandard

item.title: "If all we hear is how there’s violence on the streets and t
item.description: "If all we hear is how there’s violence on the streets and thefts are up, do you really expect visitors to feel good?" asks Fat Tony Read more: https://www.standard.co.uk//comment/london-holidays-restaurants-tourism-protests-b1178772.html

item.title: "It creates a generation of neurotic youngsters who attach a
item.description: "It creates a generation of neurotic youngsters who attach all sorts of acronyms to themselves, when really they might just need to put their phones down," writes Claudia Cockerell Read more: https://www.standard.co.uk/.../gen-z-tiktok-mental-health...

item.title: Merge with Reform? Move to the centre? Tory members don't kn
item.description: Merge with Reform? Move to the centre? Tory members don't know what to do. The award-winning West End Final newsletter is out now
